contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 25th day of August, 2005, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED; the Order of the Superior Court is hereby REVERSED; and the case is REMANDED for reinstatement of Petitioners entitlement to pursue a direct appeal. Commonwealth v. Halley, 870 A.2d 795 (Pa.2005).
